1491540.name: MAP GAME: Or Something
1491540.description:
MAP GAME is a short puzzle-platformer game in which Cart - a bored kid looking for adventure - and Map Guy - an adventurer who has been cursed to be trapped inside of a map - journey to find a way to free Map Guy of his curse. Along the journey, these idiots run into some trouble and meet a powerful adversary. Help them fight back to free Map Guy from his curse and Cart of their boredom.

Cool features in this 'game' include:
  • Draw custom maps of levels in order to navigate through them
  • Solve puzzles and get through short levels to advance through each chapter
  • Meet some green clown who wants to kill you with a few lasers
  • Get to know the characters and their wacky wild personalities
  • Play through fun challenge levels which offer unique mechanics to play with
  • Defeat cool bosses who desire nothing more than for you to turn into a corpse
  • Play secret level which remix the game in a challenging way
  • Discover the mysterious nature behind the curse
